text: Probation () is a 1960 Soviet drama movie directed by Vladimir Gerasimov.Московские кинотеатры бесплатно покажут фильмы с участием Олега ЕфремоваИСПЫТАТЕЛЬНЫЙ СРОК It stars Oleg Yefremov, Oleg Tabakov, and Vyacheslav Nevinny. == Actors == *Oleg Yefremov as Ulyan Grigorievich Zhur * Oleg Tabakov as Sasha Yegorov *Vyacheslav Nevinny as Sergei Zaitsev * Boris Novikov as Vorobeichik *Yevgeni Urbansky as Kurychyov *Tatyana Lavrova as Varya == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1960 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Probation (1960 movie)
